pr_title: [IOTDB-922] Int and Long can convert to each other in ResultSet

timeline.bodyText: Missing apache header, please take a look.
timeline.author: HTHou

replies.bodyText: and better to changethe name to IoTDBResultSetIT
replies.author: jixuan1989
